spirits.name: Guardian
spirits.description: Summon a protective spirit that defends an ally from attacks.

spirits.name: Vengeance
spirits.description: Call forth a vengeful spirit to attack and haunt an enemy.

spirits.name: Healing
spirits.description: Summon a benevolent spirit that heals and rejuvenates allies over time.

spirits.name: The Wild
spirits.description: Call upon an animal spirit to assist in combat or tracking.

spirits.name: Wisdom
spirits.description: Summon a wise spirit to provide guidance and knowledge.

spirits.name: The Storm
spirits.description: Unleash a storm spirit to cause havoc with wind and lightning.

spirits.name: Shadows
spirits.description: Summon a shadowy spirit to scout and gather information.

spirits.name: Strength
spirits.description: Empower an ally with the strength of a powerful spirit.

spirits.name: Lies
spirits.description: Call upon a spirit to create convincing illusions to deceive enemies.

spirits.name: Tranquility
spirits.description: Summon a calming spirit to soothe emotions and restore peace.

spirits.name: Balance
spirits.description: Call upon a spirit of balance to restore equilibrium and peace.

spirits.name: Fire
spirits.description: Summon a fiery spirit that engulfs enemies in flames.

effects.effect: Burn one target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone for Hits in the result set.

spirits.name: Water
spirits.description: Call forth a water spirit to control and manipulate water.

spirits.name: Earth
spirits.description: Summon an earth spirit to create barriers and cause tremors.

spirits.name: Air
spirits.description: Call upon an air spirit to grant flight and manipulate the wind.

spirits.name: Light
spirits.description: Summon a radiant spirit to illuminate dark areas and blind foes.

spirits.name: Darkness
spirits.description: Call forth a spirit of darkness to obscure vision and create shadows.

spirits.name: The Forest
spirits.description: Call upon a spirit of nature to control plants and wildlife.

spirits.name: The Moons
spirits.description: Summon a lunar spirit to grant night vision and manipulate tides.

spirits.name: The Suns
spirits.description: Call forth a solar spirit to burn away curses and empower allies.

spirits.name: Frost
spirits.description: Summon a frost spirit to freeze enemies and create ice barriers.

spirits.name: Thunder
spirits.description: Call upon a thunder spirit to unleash powerful lightning strikes.

spirits.name: The Hunt
spirits.description: Summon a hunting spirit to track and capture prey.

spirits.name: Mountain
spirits.description: Call forth a mountain spirit to grant immense strength and endurance.

spirits.name: Sea
spirits.description: Summon a sea spirit to control ocean currents and summon sea creatures.

spirits.name: Chaos
spirits.description: Summon a chaotic spirit to disrupt enemies and create confusion.

spirits.name: The Deserts
spirits.description: Call forth a desert spirit to create sandstorms and desiccation.

spirits.name: Sky
spirits.description: Summon a sky spirit to control weather and see great distances.

spirits.name: The Condemned
spirits.description: Call upon an underworld spirit to communicate with the dead and protect against necromancy.

spirits.name: Courage
spirits.description: Summon a courageous spirit to bolster morale and instill bravery in allies.

spirits.name: Justice
spirits.description: Call forth a spirit of justice to judge the wicked and uphold the law.

spirits.name: Fortune
spirits.description: Summon a spirit of luck to influence chance and bring good fortune.

spirits.name: Knowledge
spirits.description: Call upon a spirit of knowledge to uncover secrets and provide insights.

spirits.name: Dreams
spirits.description: Summon a dream spirit to influence sleep, dreams, and the subconscious mind.

spirits.name: War
spirits.description: Summon a warrior spirit to bolster your ferocity and destroy your foes.

spirits.name: Myozo no Kaze (Star Wind)
spirits.description: A wind that brings clarity and vision, guiding those who seek wisdom and insight.

spirits.name: Amabu no Kaze (Radiant Wind)
spirits.description: A wind infused with healing light, restoring health and vitality to those it touches.

spirits.name: Koro-koro no Kaze (Thunder Wind)
spirits.description: A wind that carries the power of thunder, capable of invoking storms and shattering obstacles.

spirits.name: Tamah no Kaze (Spirit Wind)
spirits.description: A wind that connects the living with the spirits of the ancestors, providing guidance and ancestral strength.

spirits.name: Hametzu no Kaze (Destruction Wind)
spirits.description: A wind of pure destructive force, capable of tearing down barriers and overwhelming foes.

spirits.name: Jensu no Kaze (Life Wind)
spirits.description: A wind that breathes life into barren lands, promoting growth and rejuvenation.

spirits.name: Hotanei no Kaze (Justice Wind)
spirits.description: A wind that upholds the principles of justice and order, dispelling chaos and corruption.

spirits.name: Umi no Kaze (Dream Wind)
spirits.description: A wind that weaves through the realm of dreams, inspiring creativity and revealing hidden truths.

spirits.name: Musui no Kaze (Water Wind)
spirits.description: A wind that flows with the essence of water, capable of summoning rains and controlling rivers.

spirits.name: Sugi no Toro (The Great Lantern)
spirits.description: The 6 chambered lantern that captures all the light of the world.

spirits.name: The Hero
spirits.description: An ancestor who performed great acts of bravery and valor, inspiring courage and strength.

spirits.name: The Traitor
spirits.description: An ancestor known for betrayal, whose spirit now serves as a warning against deceit and treachery.

spirits.name: The Healer
spirits.description: An ancestor who dedicated their life to healing the sick and wounded, offering restorative and protective powers.

spirits.name: The Warrior
spirits.description: An ancestor famed for their combat prowess and strategic mind, granting strength and battle skills.

spirits.name: The Trickster
spirits.description: An ancestor who was a master of deception and cunning, helping to outwit enemies and navigate difficult situations.

spirits.name: The Protector
spirits.description: An ancestor who safeguarded their community, offering shielding and defensive abilities.

spirits.name: The Seeker
spirits.description: An ancestor who was a relentless pursuer of truth and knowledge, aiding in uncovering secrets and hidden paths.

spirits.name: The Betrayed
spirits.description: An ancestor who suffered betrayal, their spirit now warns and protects against similar treacheries.

spirits.name: The Martyr
spirits.description: An ancestor who sacrificed themselves for a greater cause, providing resilience and determination.

spirits.name: The Lover
spirits.description: An ancestor known for their deep compassion and love, offering comfort and emotional strength.

spirits.name: The Wanderer
spirits.description: An ancestor who traveled far and wide, offering skills in navigation and discovery.

spirits.name: The Harbinger
spirits.description: An ancestor who foretold significant events, providing prophetic visions and foresight.

spirits.name: The Keeper
spirits.description: An ancestor who preserved traditions and knowledge, aiding in the retention and recall of important information.

spirits.name: The Avenger
spirits.description: An ancestor who sought to avenge wrongs, offering vengeful and retributive powers.

spirits.name: The Peacemaker
spirits.description: An ancestor who resolved conflicts and promoted harmony, aiding in diplomacy and reconciliation.

spirits.name: The Innovator
spirits.description: An ancestor known for their creativity and invention, providing inspiration and problem-solving abilities.

threshold.effect: Send a bolt of cosmic energy at a target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone, scoring 1 Hit.
Send a bolt of cosmic energy at a target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone, scoring 2 Hits.
Send a wave of energy outward, pushing all targets in your Current Zone to the Adjacent Zone closest to them.

Open a cosmic tunnel between your Current Zone and a linear Zone up to 2 Zones adjacent.  Until the end of your next turn, characters can Shift to Move between the tunnel's endpoints without incurring Hazard.

Open a cosmic tunnel between your Current Zone and a linear Zone up to 2 Zones adjacent.  Until the end of your next turn, You and your allies Shift to Move between the tunnel's endpoints without incurring Hazard.
The current Timer expires.
The current Timer expires.  The next Timer is set to 4.

threshold.effec: When one of your allies you can see suffers Hits from an attack, you momentarily send them to the Aether, reducing the Hits they take by Hits in the result set.

threshold.effect: When one of your allies you can see suffers Hits from an attack, you momentarily send them to the Aether, reducing the Hits they take by Hits in the result set.  Create 1 Advantage in the target ally's Current Zone.
Gain X Hits to your Current, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
Deal 3 Hits to up to 2 targets in your Current or Adjacent Zone.
Deal 3 Hits to up to 3 targets in your Current or Adjacent Zone.
Deal 1 + X Hits to one target in your Current Zone, where X is equal to the number of consecutive turns you have used this technique.

One target you can see in your Current Zone gains Aura 2 as you wrap them in flames.  They suffer 2 Hits to their Grit on each of their turns while this Aura persists, and they add +2 Bonus Hits in fire damage when they use Grapple, Strike or Martial Arts.

One target you can see in your Current Zone gains Aura 2 as you wrap them in flames.  They suffer 2 Hits to their Grit on each of their turns while this Aura persists, and they add +3 Bonus Hits inin fire damage when they use Grapple, Strike or Martial Arts.
Deal 3 Hits to one target in your Current or Adjacent Zone.  If that target dies, deal 2 Hits to another target in the same Zone.
Deal 5 Hits to one target in your Current or Adjacent Zone.  If that target dies, deal 3 Hits to another target in the same Zone.
Deal 2 Hits to up to 3 targets in an Adjacent Zone.
Deal 3 Hits to up to 4 targets in an Adjacent Zone.
Target your Current and an Adjacent Zone.  Deal 2 Hits to all targets in the targetted Zone.
Target your Current and an Adjacent Zone.  Deal 4 Hits to all targets in the targetted Zone.

Target your Current or an Adjacent Zone, then choose one (1):
  • All hostile targets in the targetted Zone take 3 Hits and gain Dazed 2.
  • All allies in the targetted Zone recover 3 Hits to their Primary Defense and regain up to 2 Grit.

Target your Current or an Adjacent Zone, then choose one or both:
  • All hostile targets in the targetted Zone take 3 Hits and gain Dazed 2.
  • All allies in the targetted Zone recover 4 Hits to their Primary Defense and regain up to 2 Grit.
One target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone recover 3 Hits to their Primary Defense and all their Gear repairs +1 rating.
Deal 2 Hits to up to 3 targets in an Adjacent Zone.
Deal 3 Hits to up to 4 targets in an Adjacent Zone.
One target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone recovers X to their Primary Defense and reduces all Statuses by X, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
When you suffer Hits from a melee attack, reduce the Hits taken by X + 1, where X is equal to Hits in this Technique's result set, and the attacker gains Blind 1
Up to 3 targets in your Current or an Adjacent Zone take 3 Hits and gain Fatigued 2.
Up to 3 targets in your Current or an Adjacent Zone take 3 Hits and gain Fatigued 2. Gain +2 Current.
One target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone gains Confused 2.
Up to 2 targets in your Current or an Adjacent Zone gains Confused 1.
One target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone recover gains Dazed X and Confused X, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
One target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone takes X Hits or gains Stunned 2, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.

Select one target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone and choose one (1):
  • The target takes X Hits to their Nerve, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
  • The target gains Dazed 2 and Confused 2.
  • You gain +4 Current.

Select one target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone and choose two (2):
  • The target takes X Hits to their Nerve, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
  • The target gains Dazed 2 and Confused 2.
  • You gain +4 Current.
Up to three targets in your Current or an Adjacent Zone lose X Grit, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
Up to three targets in your Current or an Adjacent Zone lose X Grit, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.  You gain +3 Current.
Spend 3 Grit, then 1 target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone loses X +3 Grit, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
Spend 2 Momentum.  You gain +4 Current.
One target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone loses X Grit, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
One target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone loses X Grit and one other target in your Current Zone regains X Grit, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
One target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone gains Wounded 1.
One target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone gains Wounded 1.  You gain +2 Current.
When a target in your Current Zone dies, increase the Entropy +1 and one other target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone loses X +2 Grit, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
When a target in your Current Zone dies, increase the Entropy +1 and one other target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone loses X +2 Grit.  You gain +2 Current.

Target your Current or an Adjacent Zone, then choose one (1):
  • All targets in the targetted Zone gain Afraidd 2 and gain Confused 2.
  • Increase the Entropy by +1 and you gain +3 Current.

Target your Current or an Adjacent Zone, then choose one or both:
  • All hostile targets in the targetted Zone gain Afraidd 2 and gain Confused 2.
  • Increase the Entropy by +1 and you gain +3 Current.

Select a target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone and then choose one (1):
  • The target takes X Hits and gains Vulnerable 1, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
  • The target loses all Auras and loses 2 Grit.
All targets in your Current or an Adjacent Zone becomee Prone and gain Vulnerable 1.  Increase the Entropy by +1.
Increase the Entropy +2 and immediately take X Actions, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
Spend 5 Entropy and immediately take X Actions, X . . .  The Momentum equals 5.

Select one target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone and choose one (1):
  • The target takes X Hits to their Nerve, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
  • The target gains Afraidd 2 and Wounded 1.
  • You gain +3 Current.

Select one target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone and choose two (2):
  • The target takes X Hits to their Nerve, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
  • The target gains Afraidd 2 and Wounded 1.
  • You gain +3 Current.
Increase the Entropy by +1.
One target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone gains Vulnerable 2.  You gain +2 Current.
When you suffer Hits from an effect you can see, you may increase the Entropy by +2. If you do, you immediately Shift to Move to an Adjacent Zone and suffer 0 Hits.

Select a target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone and then choose one (1):
  • The target gains Fatigued 1.
  • The target takes 2 Hits to Nerve.

Select a target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone and then choose one or both:
  • The target gains Fatigued 1.
  • The target takes 2 Hits to Nerve.
Your Current or an Adjacent Zone gains Hazard 1.
All targets in your Current or an Adjacent Zone gain Blind 2.  The targetted zone gains Hazard 1.
All targets in those Zones gain Blind 1 Ongoing.  You gain +X Current, where X is the number of targets Blinded this way.

All light in your Current Zone are extinguished and all targets in your Current Zone gain Blind 1 Ongoing.

At the beginning of each of your turns while this Techniqe is Ongoing, copy its effect to all Adjacent Zones.
You can see in absolute darkness and are immune to the Blind status.
One target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone takes 1 Hit to Grit and gains Wounded 1.
One target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone takes 2 Hits to Grit.
One target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone takes 3 Hits and gains Vulnerable 1.
One target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone takes 6 Hits and gains Fatigued 1.  Increase the Entropy by +1.
When you suffer Hits from a melee attack form a target you can see, you may deal X Hits to that target and have them gain Fatigued 1, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
One target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone takes 2 Hits to Grit.  If that target was Vulnerable, you gain +2 Current.
All targets except you in your Current Zone gain Vulnerable 1.  You gain +X Current, wher eX is euqal to the number of targets that gained Vulnerable from this technique.
If you score 3+ Hits on the next Technique you use this turn, gain +3 Current.

Target your Current or an Adjacent Zone, then choose one (1):
  • All targets except for you in the targetted Zone gain Fatigued 1 and lose 2 Grit.
  • Increase the Entropy by +1 and you gain +2 Current.

Target your Current or an Adjacent Zone, then choose one or both:
  • All targets except for you in the targetted Zone gain Fatigued 1 and lose 2 Grit.
  • Increase the Entropy by +1 and you gain +2 Current.
One target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone loses 3 Grit.  If the target dies, you gain +3 Current.  Otherwise, the target gains Vulnerable 2.
One target in your Current Zone take 4 Hits and gains Frozen 1.
All targets except you in your Current Zone gains Frozen 4.
When you suffer Hits from a melee attack form a target you can see, you may deal 2 Hits to that target and have them gain Frozen 2.
One target in your Current or and Adjacent Zone takes X Hits and gains Slowed 1.

Target your Current or an Adjacent Zone, then choose one (1):
  • The targetted Zone gains Hazard 3. All targets in the targetted Zone take 1 Hits and gain Slowed 1 Ongoing.
  • The targetted Zone gains Hazard 1. All targets in the targetted Zone gain Fatigued 1 Ongoing. You gain +2 Current.

Target your Current or an Adjacent Zone, then choose one or both:
  • The targetted Zone gains Hazard 3. All targets in the targetted Zone take 1 Hits and gain Slowed 1 Ongoing.
  • The targetted Zone gains Hazard 1. All targets in the targetted Zone gain Fatigued 1 Ongoing. You gain +2 Current.

Target your Current or an Adjacent Zone, then choose one (1):
  • All targets in the targetted Zone take become Prone and gain Dazed 2.
  • All targets in the targetted Zone are moved to an Adjacent Zone and you gain +4 Current.

Target your Current or an Adjacent Zone, then choose one or both:
  • All targets in the targetted Zone take become Prone and gain Dazed 2.
  • All targets in the targetted Zone are moved to an Adjacent Zone and you gain +4 Current.
One target in your Current or and Adjacent Zone gains the Fly keyword.
Up to 2 targets in your Current or and Adjacent Zone gain the Fly keyword.
One target in your Current Zone take X Hits and is moved to an Adjacent Zone, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
Divide X Hits among up to 3 targets in yoru Current Zone, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.  The targets are all moved to an Adjacent Zone,
One target in your Current or and Adjacent Zone loses the Fly keyword Ongoing.
Up to X targets in your Current or and Adjacent Zone loses the Fly keyword Ongoing, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
Target your Current or an Adacent Zone.  The targetted Zone gains Hazard 2 and all targets in the Zone take 3 Hits.

Target your Current or an Adjacent Zone, then choose one (1):
  • Increase the Entropy by +2. All targets in the targetted Zone take become Prone and take X Hits, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
  • Increase the Entropy by +3 and increase the Momentum by +3.
    All targets in the targetted Zone gain Confused 2 and take X Hits, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.

Target your Current or an Adjacent Zone, then choose one or both:
  • Increase the Entropy by +2. All targets in the targetted Zone take become Prone and take X Hits, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
  • Increase the Entropy by +3 and increase the Momentum by +3.
    All targets in the targetted Zone gain Confused 2 and take X Hits, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
One target in your Current Zone reduces one Status by -2.
One target in your Current Zone reduces one Status by X, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
Deal 2 Hits to up to 3 targets in an Adjacent Zone.
Deal 2 Hits to up to 5 targets in an Adjacent Zone.
Target your Current and an Adjacent Zone to gain Hazard 3.  Deal 3 Hits to all targets in the targetted Zone.

Target your Current and an Adjacent Zone to gain Hazard 3. Deal 3 Hits to all targets in the targetted Zone.
You gain +2 Current.
Move to any Adjacent Zone ignoring Hazards.  One target in the destination Zone takes 1 Hits and becomes Prone, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
Move to any Adjacent Zone ignoring Hazards.  One target in the destination Zone takes X Hits and becomes Prone, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
One target in your Current or and Adjacent Zone takes X Hits, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
One target in your Current or and Adjacent Zone takes 2 Hits and gains Stunned 2.

Target your Current or an Adjacent Zone, then choose one (1):
  • Increase the Entropy by +1. All targets in the targetted Zone take gain Stunned 1 Ongoing.
  • Increase the Entropy by +2 and increase the Momentum by +3.
    All targets in the targetted Zone take X Hits, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.

Target your Current or an Adjacent Zone, then choose one or both:
  • Increase the Entropy by +1. All targets in the targetted Zone take gain Stunned 1 Ongoing.
  • Increase the Entropy by +2 and increase the Momentum by +3.
    All targets in the targetted Zone take X Hits, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
One target in your Current or and Adjacent Zone takes 2 Hits and gains Dazed 1.
One target in your Current or and Adjacent Zone takes 2 Hits and gains Dazed 1.  You gain +1 Current.
You gain +2 Current.
One target in your Current or and Adjacent Zone takes 2 Hits and becomes Prone.
Up to 2 targets in your Current or and Adjacent Zone take 2 Hits and become Prone.
If you score 3+ Hits on the next Technique you use this turn, you gain +2 Current.
One target in your Current Zone gains Confused 2.
Up to 3 targets in your Current Zone gain Confused 2.

One target in your Current or and Adjacent Zone takes X Hits, where X is equal to Hits in the result set., then choose one (1):
  • The target gains Restrained 3.
  • You pull the target into your Current Zone.
  • You gain +2 Current.
Target your Current or an Adjacent Zone.  All targets in the targetted Zone gain Restrained 2.

One target in your Current Zone can choose one (1):
  • Regain X Grit, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
  • Reduce one Status by X, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.

Up to 3 targets in your Current Zone can choose one (1):
  • Regain X Grit, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
  • Reduce one Status by X, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
All targets except you in yoru Current Zone take 3 Hits and become Prone.
You gain Aura X, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.  While this Aura persists, your can breathe underwater and ignore Hazards in underwater Zones.
Recover X to your Primary Defense, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
One target in an Adjacent Zone is moved into your Current Zone.
Up to 3 targets in an Adjacent Zone are moved into your Current Zone.
One target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone recovers X +2 to their Primary Defense and regains X Grit, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
One target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone recovers X +2 to their Primary Defense and regains X Grit, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.  You gain +2 Current.

Target your Current or an Adjacent Zone, then choose one (1):
  • All hostile targets in the targetted Zone take 3 Hits and gain Dazed 2.
  • All allies in the targetted Zone recover 3 Hits to their Primary Defense and regain up to 2 Grit.

Target your Current or an Adjacent Zone, then choose one or both:
  • All hostile targets in the targetted Zone take 3 Hits and gain Dazed 2.
  • All allies in the targetted Zone recover 4 Hits to their Primary Defense and regain up to 2 Grit.
One target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone recovers X to their Primary Defense and reduces all Statuses by X, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
One target in yoru Current Zone regains X Grit, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.
